actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: A bill to direct the Attorney General to study the problems of indigent, elderly immigrants who wish to return to their home countries but cannot afford to pay the transportation costs to do so.

summary.text: Immigrant Repatriation Study Act - Directs the Attorney General to study the problem of indigent, elderly immigrants who wish to return to their home countries but can not afford the transportation costs to do so. Requires a report to Congress within 12 months.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Attorney General to study the problems of indigent, elderly immigrants who wish to return to their home countries but cannot afford to pay the transportation costs to do so.
